name: make-porto-win-european-best-destination-2017
description: Let's make Porto win the European Best Destination 2017

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.build: $(which docker) build -t $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version --build-arg=VERSION=`$(which git) rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` --build-arg=VERSION_COMMIT=`$(which git) rev-parse --short HEAD` --build-arg=VERSION_BUILD_DATE="`$(which date)`" -f ./share/docker/Dockerfile .
